nodes.name: August
nodes.description: After spending a summer in the New Mexico desert, August became passionate about circular foods. First it was waffles, now it is pizza.

nodes.name: Louise
nodes.description: Louise runs an Etsy shop that sells hand-painted elephant ceramics customized based on your astrology sign. Judges you for ordering extra sauce.

nodes.name: Roscoe
nodes.description: Roscoe is the leftover manager. Loves Puperoni. Currently on a diet.

nodes.name: Roscoe
nodes.description: Roscoe is the leftover manager. Loves Puperoni. Currently on a diet.

nodes.name: Piper
nodes.description: Piper went to Italy once. Will tell you how much better the pizza is 'over there'. She has no college debt.

nodes.name: Slick
nodes.description: Slick is the proprietor, he inherited the business from his late grandfather. Refers to himself as the Pablo Escobar of pizza. He grows his own tomatoes and wonâ€™t let anyone ese near them...a little odd but we like him.

nodes.name: Waldo
nodes.description: Some say Waldo is searching for the freshest ingredents, but in reality pizza isn't a passion, it's a paycheck. Deep down, Waldo is still trying to find himself.

nodes.name: Fia
nodes.description: Fia qualified for Canada's 2018 rhythmic gymnastics Olympic but left the sport to focus full-time on pizza, where she's developing a new kind of pizza toss (a very fast one where you do a flip)

nodes.name: Enoch
nodes.description: Enoch played guitar in a ska band but was forced out due to creative differences. Claim to fame is that a picture of Enoch comes up first when you Google 'people enjoying Italian street foods'.

nodes.name: Oak
nodes.description: Oak grows his own basil at home and brings it in. While he loves pizza, it pays the bills while he works on his hot sauce startup. Went his whole life calling the crust a "Pizza Border".
